title: The Mothership: The Vin Diesel tribute episode
text:

Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs The Mothership: The Vin Diesel tribute episode Brian Truitt , USA TODAY 3:01 p.m. ET Jan. 20, 2017 Vin Diesel as extreme athlete-turned-spy Xander Cage in the sequel 'xXx: Return of Xander Cage.' (Photo: George Kraychyk) 
He's fast, he's furious and he's fueling a special tribute edition of The Mothership . 
In this week's episode of USA TODAY's geek culture podcast, we pay tribute to the cinematic works of Vin Diesel. There's a discussion naturally of his action-packed works like the Fast and Furious series and Diesel's new sequel xXx: Return of Xander Cage , but also his very diverse resume from the animated film The Iron Giant to superhero flick Guardians of the Galaxy . 
Have thoughts about the podcast or disagree with us? Reach out to us on Twitter at @klawls , @brettmolina23 or @briantruitt . If you enjoy the podcast, please subscribe to and review The Mothership on iTunes here . Your ratings, reviews and feedback help keep us on the air. 
The Mothership is USA TODAY's podcast that covers all things nerdy in pop culture. Hosted by tech reporter Brett Molina, film critic Brian Truitt and entertainment writer Kelly Lawler, each week our roundtable of experts dissects the latest in geek culture, from superhero movies to sci-fi TV shows to the latest and greatest video games. We're saving the world from bad comic-book adaptations every Friday on iTunes , Soundcloud and Stitcher . Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2k9nIs2 NEVER MISS OUT Life Be a pop culture maven. Get the news, reviews and the juiciest celebrity stories that keep you in the know, Monday-Friday. THANKS FOR SIGNING UP FOR THE Life NEWSLETTER 
We're sorry.
